text:
@realDonaldTrump Fox News poll -- approval of how each has responded to coronavirus:

Dr. Fauci 74-19 (+55)
Your State gov't 70-27 (+43)
Federal gov't 51-45 (+6)
Mike Pence 47-44 (+3)
Donald Trump 43-55 (-12)

Approval for Trump's response with independents is *37* points underwater at 28-65.
